sections.heading: About TEEI
sections.content: The Educational Equality Institute works to provide quality education access to underserved communities worldwide. Through innovative partnerships and technology-driven solutions, we're breaking down barriers to education.

sections.heading: Together for Ukraine
sections.content: Our flagship program supporting displaced Ukrainian students with access to online learning resources, technology equipment, and educational support services. Partnering with AWS provides cloud infrastructure for our learning platform.

sections.heading: Partnership Impact
sections.content: With AWS cloud services, we've scaled our platform to serve 850+ students across 12 partner organizations. The partnership enables reliable, secure access to educational resources for students who need it most.

callToAction.heading: Ready to Partner with TEEI?
callToAction.text: Join us in transforming educational access for underserved communities.

hero.prompt: A warm, authentic photo of diverse students collaborating on laptops in a modern learning space. Natural golden hour lighting, deep teal and warm beige color scheme. Professional photography style, hopeful and empowering atmosphere. Photorealistic, high detail.
